weight: 405 g (without Battery and Memory Card), 445 g (with Battery and Memory Card)
whitebalancing: Automatic scene recognition, Preset:Fine, Shade, Fluorescent light (Daylight), Fluorescent light (Warm White), Fluorescent light (Cool White), Incandescent light, underwater, Custom, Color temperature selection
focallength: f=23 mm, equivalent to 35 mm on a 35 mm camera
imageformat: JPEG, EXIF 2.3, DCF, DPOF 1.1, RAW, RAW JPEG
flashmodes: Red-eye removal OFF : Auto, Forced Flash, Suppressed Flash, Slow Synchro, Red-eye removal ON : Red-eye Reduction Auto, Red-eye Reduction & Forced Flash, Suppressed Flash, Red-eye Reduction & Slow Synchro.
